subject: Scholarships and Fellowships
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: After 24 years in the Meadowlands, the game, which George Steinbrenner supported early on to help pay for college scholarships, will be played in New York in November and return in 2013.
snippet: After 24 years in the Meadowlands, the game, which George Steinbrenner supported early on to help pay for college scholarships, will be played in New York in November and return in 2013.
